Plot: Paddington is happily settled with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he has become a popular member of the community, spreading joy and marmalade wherever he goes. While searching for the perfect present for his beloved Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, Paddington spots a unique pop-up book in Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and embarks upon a series of odd jobs to buy it. But when the book is stolen, it's up to Paddington and the Browns to unmask the thief.
Title: Paddington 2
Actors: Michael Gambon, Imelda Staunton, Ben Whishaw, Madeleine Harris
Awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 14 wins & 43 nominations.
Writer: Paul King, Simon Farnaby, Michael Bond ("Paddington Bear" created by), Mark Burton (additional material), Jon Croker (additional material), Will Smith (additional material), Simon Stephenson (additional material)
